mapper.update: update insurance_login set login_times=login_times+1, dccuid=#{dccuid}, dccucode=#{dccucode}, memberid=#{memberid}, openid=#{openid}, userno=#{userno}, mid=#{mid}, vs_id=#{vsId}, membercode=#{membercode}, nickname=#{nickname}, shopname=#{shopname}, headerurl=#{headerurl} where id=#{id}

mapper.update:
UPDATE insurance_login
user_id = #{userId},
login_name = #{loginName},
password = #{password},
login_times = #{loginTimes},
last_login = #{lastLogin},
cardno = #{cardno},
nickname = #{nickname},
shopname = #{shopname},
headerurl = #{headerurl},
dccuid = #{dccuid},
memberid = #{memberid},
openid = #{openid},
userno = #{userno},
mid = #{mid},
vs_id = #{vsId},
membercode = #{membercode},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
WHERE id = #{id}
